resources.string: Reroute location requests to the OS APIs
Location permission needs to be set to \"%s\".

"Google\'s location service is disabled. Tap \"%1$s\" to learn more. If you decide to keep it disabled, consider enabling \"%2$s\" option to improve app compatibility (a lot of apps won\'t function properly when this service is disabled)."
Revoke location permission from Play services.
Location access is off for all apps.
"Location requests are rerouted to the OS APIs, but Play services still has Location permission."
"Play services needs Location permission to be set to \"%s\" and \"Use precise location\"."
"Location estimation by Bluetooth scanning requires \"Nearby devices\" permission."
Always-on Wi-Fi scanning is enabled, but not allowed (no Location permission).
Always-on Bluetooth scanning is enabled, but not allowed (no \"Nearby devices\" permission).

"To install apps that include OBB files (usually the ones that are over 100 MB in size), Play Store needs to have \"Files and media\" permission.
After this permission is granted, Play Store needs to be fully restarted with \"Force stop\" button."
"A lot of games won\'t function properly without Play Games app (they will show misleading \"Missing permissions\" prompt)."
"When device is idle, push notifications will be delayed to increase battery life. To receive them promptly, set \"Battery usage\" to \"Unrestricted\" in Play services settings."
